Pre-Game Insights: Denver went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division play and 33-8 at home a season ago.
Utah finished 31-51 overall and 5-11 in Northwest Division play during the 2023-24 season.
The Nuggets averaged 7.1 steals, 5.6 blocks and 11.8 turnovers per game last season.
Utah shot 46.7% from the field and 35.4% from 3-point range last season.
Denver's Vlatko Cancar is day to day (ankle), Aaron Gordon is day to day (knee), and DaRon Holmes II is out for the season (achilles).
Utah's Lauri Markkanen is day to day (back), Taylor Hendricks is out for the season (fibula), and Isaiah Collier is day to day (hamstring).
